data.name: F1® 2020: Seventy Edition DLC
data.detailed_description: Celebrate the 70th anniversary of F1® with unique in-game customisation items - car livery, podium celebration, helmet, race suit, gloves, boots and player badge.
data.about_the_game: Celebrate the 70th anniversary of F1® with unique in-game customisation items - car livery, podium celebration, helmet, race suit, gloves, boots and player badge.
data.short_description: Celebrate the 70th anniversary of F1® with unique in-game customisation items - car livery, podium celebration, helmet, race suit, gloves, boots and player badge.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
